title: (x) Pastor's Essentials - ITC Mixage {Raph Levien}
content: [ITC Mixage](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110142438/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/mixage/), in what looks like [regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110142438/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/mixage/mixage/testdrive.html?s=Pastor%27s&p=72) and [bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110142438/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/mixage/bold/testdrive.html?s=essentials&p=60) weights.
author: raph
